message: Let's be reasonable, 60-40 is a fair split
I understand you want a larger share, but I believe my contributions warrant a slightly higher percentage.  This offer considers fairness while acknowledging the time value of money.
Considering the time value of money, I've compromised, but still believe I deserve the larger share
Alice, let's be practical. This back and forth is only hurting both of us due to inflation.  A 50/50 split is the fairest and ensures we both benefit the most.
